name: 黃琮昇
objective:
集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯
電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及
弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻
率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，
拉式轉換。
Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallel
circuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuit
analysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuits
PSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction, Sinusoidal Steady-State Analysis
Week 2: Sinusoidal Steady-State Analysis
Week 3: Sinusoidal Steady-State Power Calculations
Week 4: Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
Week 5: Introduction to the Laplace Transform
Week 6: The Laplace Transform in Circuit Analysis
Week 7: The Laplace Transform in Circuit Analysis
Week 8: Introduction to Frequency Selective Circuits
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Active Filter Circuit
Week 11: Active Filter Circuit
Week 12: Fourier Series
Week 13: Fourier Series
Week 14: The Fourier Transform
Week 15: The Fourier Transform
Week 16: Two-Port Circuits
Week 17: Two-Port Circuits
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Textbook: James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel, "Electric Circuits," 11/e, Pearson, 2020. (滄海圖書代理)
